channel.title: 6 on Glyn Mottershead
channel.description: Recent content in 6 on Glyn Mottershead

item.title: Are You Talking To Me?: An Analysis of Journalism Conversation on Social Media
item.description: This preliminary research aims to show how computational analysis allows us to investigate the means by which news stories are spread.

item.title: Subediting and production for journalists
item.description: Subediting and Production for Journalists is an introduction to the skills of subediting for newspapers, magazines and websites.
